channel.title: Vote shop help
channel.description: hey guys im trying to make a vote shop for PI servers and i got no clue on hwo to do it can anyone teach me please give me a ful tut on this thanks ^_^

item.title: Vote shop help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:8, topic:403677”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=500742.msg3662872#msg3662872 date=1310441978]

Very advanced stuff. First, you gotta make a website to advertise your voting sites. Then you have to use MySQL to detect if the player has voted. Then, you have to give tokens to the player who voted. Then, you have to make a shop that takes tokens for items. Probably the hardest parts would be the MySQL and the adding the shop. Good luck, just a few steps. You would need more than 2 advanced guides to make this.

He just wants to add a Vote shop, to take points or tokens prob :x, but good info.
[/quote]That’s exactly what I said. Get points by voting and then spend them at a shop.

No, lol you went into explanation about making a Voting system.[/quote]Not just that, I told him how to do the whole thing, but he needs to find his own tuts though.

Read full topic
